title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful dish made with tender chicken pieces simmered in a spicy curry sauce.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy meal with assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Mexican-style tacos with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa in soft tortillas.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.
